question: Who is the current leader in PTS per game?
additional info: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander is currently leading the league in points per game.

question: Who is the current leader in REB per game?
additional info: Domantas Sabonis is currently leading the league in rebounds per game.

question: Who is the current leader in AST per game?
additional info: Trae Young is currently leading the league in assists per game.

question: Which NBA player has won the most MVP awards?
additional info: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar won 6 MVP awards during his career, the most in NBA history.

question: Who was the first player to be drafted straight out of high school?
additional info: Moses Malone was drafted in the 1974 ABA Draft.

question: Which team holds the record for the most wins in a single regular season?
additional info: The Golden State Warriors achieved 73 wins in the 2015-2016 season.

question: Who is the all-time leading scorer in NBA history?
additional info: LeBron James has scored over 40,474 points in his career.

question: Which player scored 100 points in a single NBA game?
additional info: Wilt Chamberlain scored 100 points on March 2, 1962.

question: What is the name of the NBA trophy awarded to the champions?
additional info: The Larry O’Brien Championship Trophy is awarded to the NBA champions.

question: Which NBA team has the most championships?
additional info: The Boston Celtics have won 18 championships.

question: Who was the youngest player to score 30,000 points in his career?
additional info: LeBron James became the youngest player to score 30,000 points in 2018.

question: Which player has the most career assists in NBA history?
additional info: John Stockton holds the record with 15,806 career assists.

question: Who is the only player to average a triple-double for an entire season, and how many times has he done it?
additional info: Russell Westbrook averaged a triple-double four times in his career.

question: Who was the first non-American player to be named NBA MVP?
additional info: Hakeem Olajuwon, from Nigeria, won the MVP award in 1994.

question: Which player holds the record for most points scored in a single playoff game?
additional info: Michael Jordan scored 63 points against the Boston Celtics on April 20, 1986.

question: What year was the NBA founded?
additional info: The NBA was founded on June 6, 1946, as the Basketball Association of America (BAA).

question: Who was the first player in NBA history to be unanimously voted MVP?
additional info: Stephen Curry was unanimously voted MVP in the 2015-2016 season.

question: Which NBA coach has the most career wins?
additional info: Gregg Popovich has over 1,388 career wins as an NBA coach.
